FuncDef: The put command uploads a local file to the remote FTP server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the local file name.
The value is a string of 1 to 128 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the file name on the remote FTP server.
The value is a string of 1 to 128 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: 200 EPRT command successful. Consider using EPSV.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If you do not specify the file name on the remote server, the uploaded file uses the same name as that of the local file.
